greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors d of n such that n/d is not congruent to 0 mod 3.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} k*x^k*(1 + x^k)/(1 - x^(3*k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 13 2019
a(n) = A000203(n) - A000203(n/3), where A000203(.)=0 for non-integer arguments . - _R. J. Mathar_, May 25 2020
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Dec 18 2002
ext: Extended by _Klaus Brockhaus_ and _Benoit Cloitre_, Dec 20 2002
